exceptions.tactic: intros f n m l H1 H2.
intros f' n m l H1 H2.
intros f' n' m l H1 H2.
intros f' n' m' l H1 H2.
intros f' n' m' l' H1 H2.

original: intros f n m l H1 H2. rewrite -> (firstn_le_length bool (length l) (lb_pointwise l m)) by auto. rewrite -> (firstn_length_le bool (lb_pointwise l m) n) by auto. apply Le.le_trans with (length (firstn (length l) (lb_pointwise l m))). - apply firstn_le_length. - auto.
